name: Whisker Mortis (Janko Zorbas)
description:
Controls:

WASD - To move, Mouse Pointer - Look direction, Left Click - Attack, Right Click - Pickup weapon/Throw weapon if equipped, R - Reload level

This game was made as a part of university project.  (1st year, 1st semester)

Team Lead - Noah Alex Hunter

Programming - Alexis Bojaruns 

Lead Artist - Janko Zorbas (me)

Lead Designer - Tomass Sepetis

Design/Art - William Olav Karlsen 

Music Composer - Jørgen L Tøraasen

Chambers_2 level (the one before the last battle) is impossible to beat in this version (should be fixed), so just unlock all levels from the main menu, and skip that one.
